resources.string: Most advanced manufacturing process technology, precision machinery, most stringent quality control standards and passion for new developments with the Continuous Research and Development has taken the company to a new horizon.
Our 70% market share in this industrial segment has made us “MARKET LEADER” amongst all other players in Domestic as well as overseas market.

Our motto is “CUSTOMER DELIGHT”. Trust, you will our name and will give us chance to prove ourselves as your preferred suppliers to satisfy your all needs related to plastic processing machinery for your plant.
